Extra credit The following are extra credit opportunities that you can use for this class. For unstructured activities, you need to spend at least 1 hour on the activity. When you have completed the extra credit activity, you should print out and submit to me a reflection. The reflection should be ~ 1/2 single-spaced page and it should describe what you did and draw linkages between the activity and the course. You can submit your reflection when I see you in class or you can put it in the mailbox next to my office door (Kent 308) Week of 9/9: Help Dr. Hamman pull process samples from cages she has deployed around the oyster reefs near the waterfront. Email Dr. Hamman ASAP if you can help (eahamman@smcm.edu).
